name: DESI Data Catalog (data.desi.lbl.gov/public/)
description: Data catalog supporting the Dark Energy Spectroscopic Instrument (DESI) project, providing access to processed spectra, large-scale structure catalogs, target selection, fiber assignment catalogs, value-added catalogs, and raw data. The catalog is used for research in astronomy and cosmology, including studies of dark energy and the large-scale structure of the universe.
